On August 16, 2017, @POTUS signed my fifth bill of the year into law. Our #ForeverGIBill gets rid of the arbitrary deadline for a veteran to use their G.I. Bill benefits and strengthens education benefits for generations to come. #mtpol https://t.co/k9jg3c9ARj
